text:
Can you change:
About VisibleDx
VisibleDx is an evidence-based diagnostic decision support tool for ME/CFS, Long COVID, and POTS. It implements validated criteria from leading medical organizations to assist clinicians in systematic evaluation.

Into:
About VisibleDx
VisibleDx is an evidence-based educational tool for ME/CFS, Long COVID, and POTS. It implements validated criteria from leading medical organizations to educate healthcare professionals in systematic evaluation.
